original_text: If your eye causes you to do wrong things, then you should take it out. You should throw it away. It is better to have only one of your eyes and to have God's true life. It will be much worse if you keep both your eyes but then God throws you into hell. There the fire always burns.
korean_text: 만일 네 눈이 너를 범죄하게 하거든 빼어 내버리라 한 눈으로 영생에 들어가는 것이 두 눈을 가지고 지옥 불에 던져지는 것보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: If your eye causes you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네 눈이 너를 잘못된 일을 하게 만든다면

sentences.original_text: then you should take it out
It is better to have only one of your eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 네 눈 하나만 가지는 것이 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: and to have God's true life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 참된 생명을 가지는 것이다

sentences.original_text: if you keep both your eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 두 눈을 모두 지키지만

sentences.original_text: but then God throws you into hell
